hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Fire Arrows#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the path to #Twinrova#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Fire Keese Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Fire Arrows#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Graveyard## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##Hyrule Field## has #1# major item.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Recovery Heart#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that in the #river in the Water Temple# lies...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Slingshot#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Falling Spikes Switch Chest

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #crater's melody# is #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say only one heart piece in all of Hyrule will declare the holder a winner.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers a #stable#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path to #Barinade#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides #Mido's house#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Haunted Wasteland# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Market Bazaar#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that in #Gerudo Valley# the hammer unlocks #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Light Arrows# can be found at #the Sacred Forest Meadow#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Recovery Heart# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Double Defense#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Wallet#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that if Link could say a few words, he'd be a better public speaker.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Have you seen my dodongo? Very large, eats everything, responds to "King".^Call Darunia in Goron City if found. Huge rupee reward!

ToT (Right).text: They say that plundering #Zora's River# is a foolish choice.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Double Defense#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Purple Rupee#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Ruto's Letter#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Deku Stick#.
